attributes.action: Allow EU citizens living in the UK to vote on the upcoming general election.
attributes.additional_details:
In HM's Government own words "EU citizens are our friends, family and neighbours and the Government has been clear that we want them to stay"
So it's only fair and democratic to allow them to vote.
attributes.background:
Take the necessary steps to amend the law in order to allow EU citizens living in the UK to vote on the upcoming general election. 
This general election is about Brexit, first and foremost. EU citizens living in the UK will be deeply affected, so they should have a voice.
